title: Contemplations vpon the historicall part of the Old Testament. The eighth and last volume. In two bookes. By I.H. deane of Worcester
author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
publisher: Printed by M. Flesher for Nath. Butter,
notes: The first volume was issued under the title: Contemplations upon the principall passages of the holie storie.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
